skill.name: image-enhancer
skill.description: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity. Perfect for preparing images for presentations, documentation, or social media posts.
skill.summary: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clar...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only documentation skill. The SKILL.md file contains only human-readable guidance text with example prompts - no executable code, scripts, shell commands, or network calls exist. The static scanner flagged documentation patterns (markdown code blocks, descriptive text about encryption in content) as code security issues. All 27 findings are false positives caused by the scanner misinterpreting documentation formatting and metadata fields as executable code patterns.

content.value_statement: Images often lose quality during compression or editing. This skill improves resolution, sharpness, and clarity while preserving originals. Perfect for creating professional visuals from any image.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes image quality and identifies improvement areas
Upscales images to higher resolutions intelligently
Optimizes images for specific use cases
limitations: Does not perform actual image processing - guides AI on how to assist
Cannot access or modify files without user permission
Quality improvement depends on original image source material
Cannot generate new image content from scratch

use_cases.title: Blog and article images
use_cases.description: Enhance screenshots for blog posts, articles, and online content with professional clarity

use_cases.title: Technical documentation
use_cases.description: Create crystal-clear UI screenshots for manuals, documentation, and help guides

use_cases.title: Social media visuals
use_cases.description: Optimize images for Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and other platforms

prompt_templates.title: Fix blurry image
prompt_templates.prompt: Sharpen this blurry screenshot and enhance text clarity

prompt_templates.title: Batch processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Improve the quality of all PNG files in this directory

output: Resolution: 1920x1080, Quality: Good with slight blur
Enhancements applied: Upscaled to 2560x1440, Sharpened edges, Enhanced text clarity
Saved as: screenshot-2024-enhanced.png, Original preserved as: screenshot-2024-original.png
Applying AI upscaling with edge enhancement

output_examples.input: Reduce compression artifacts in this image

best_practices: Always specify output format (PNG for quality, JPG for smaller file size)
Mention the platform or use case for optimal image sizing
Keep original files as backup before enhancement
anti_patterns: Requesting enhancement without specifying the original file location
Assuming the skill can access files without explicit permission
Expecting generated content rather than enhancement of existing images

faq.question: Does this skill actually modify image files?
faq.answer: The skill guides the AI on how to assist with image enhancement. Actual file modification depends on your AI tool's capabilities and permissions.

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: Common formats including PNG, JPG, and web formats are supported. Specify your format when making requests.

faq.question: How much can images be upscaled?
faq.answer: Upscaling effectiveness depends on the original image quality. Higher quality sources yield better results.

faq.question: Does this work with screenshots?
faq.answer: Yes, screenshots are the ideal use case. The skill is optimized for digital images and screen captures.

faq.question: Are original files preserved?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill recommends keeping originals as backup. Enhanced versions are saved with new filenames.

faq.question: Can multiple images be processed at once?
faq.answer: Yes, batch processing is supported. Specify the folder or file pattern for multiple images.
